definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: The heat probes with pulse-heating have been applied extensively in marine geothermic study.
sentences.chinese: 脉冲加热法的探针已被广泛应用于海洋地热研究中。

sentences.english: Attach test leads to pins 1 and 2 and note ohmmeter reading.
sentences.chinese: 把测试探针连接到插头1和2，并记下欧姆表读数。

sentences.english: The calibration of hot-wire probe is also given in this p…
sentences.chinese: 文中还介绍了热线探针的校正方法。

sentences.english: A stereotaxic apparatus is used to insert the probes that record electrical activity deep within the brain cortex.
sentences.chinese: 他们使用了一个立体设备探针来记录颅内的电流活动。

sentences.english: This paper describes the sensitivity measurement of ion microprobe mass analyzer.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了测量离子探针灵敏度的各种方法。

sentences.english: Study on nuclease activity with fluorescence quenching probe.
sentences.chinese: 用荧光淬火双链探针研究核酸酶的活性。

sentences.english: Probes will always report every single scannable object within their scanning range.
sentences.chinese: 探针会报告扫描范围内扫到所有物体。

sentences.english: Until heaters can melt the ice, the pitot probes are out.
sentences.chinese: 除非用加热器将冰融化，否则皮托管的探针就会失效。

sentences.english: Then a lacrimal probe was used to probe the ducts from lacrimal puncta to lower nasal cavity along its' trend.
sentences.chinese: 之后，以探针从泪小点进针，沿泪道走行直达下鼻道。

sentences.english: When the instruction is hit, the particular handler for the probe is executed.
sentences.chinese: 当调用该指令时，将执行针对探针的特定处理函数。

sentences.english: A detachable double-jacket tube structure cryoprobe was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制了离合式套管结构冷冻探针。

sentences.english: A metal probe lifts the septum secundum and reveals the opening.
sentences.chinese: 一根金属探针将房间隔掀起以显示未闭开放。

sentences.english: Identification was made using a specific A fumigatus probe.
sentences.chinese: 检测是用特殊的真菌探针进行的。

sentences.english: A platinum film resistance temperature probe has been designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种铂薄膜热电阻温度探针。

sentences.english: The mechanic properties (E, S) of hydride are analyzed by Nano indenter II.
sentences.chinese: 用显微力学探针分析了氢化物的力学特性。

sentences.english: The conditions on probe immobilizing and hybridizing are studied during analysis.
sentences.chinese: 在分析的过程中对探针的固定和杂交条件进行了探索。
